articles.author: Scharon Harding
articles.title: The TV industry finally concedes that the future may not be in 8K - Ars Technica
articles.description: With virtually no content and limited benefits, 8K TVs were doomed.

articles.author: Ryan Whitwam
articles.title: Inside Nvidia’s 10-year effort to make the Shield TV the most updated Android device ever - Ars Technica
articles.description: Selfishly a little bit, we built Shield for ourselves."
